paragraphs: Vinegret.cz provides diverse information about the Czech Republic in the Russian language. Our readers are foreigners living in the Czech Republic and those interested in visiting the country, its culture, and realities.
The portal was established in 2014 and quickly became one of the leaders among regional news outlets in terms of growth dynamics and viewership in the Russian language.

Several times a day we publish interesting selections of news and articles from the fields of culture, business, and work relationships, inform about important changes in laws concerning foreigners, about events and happenings in Prague and larger cities, share our own experiences, and communicate with readers through social media.
Our editorial team ensures the timeliness and freshness of news and verified information, accessibility of the website from all devices, and a friendly approach to users and clients.
We offer cooperation and partnership to companies, organizations, and individuals who intend to reach out to the Russian-speaking community with their offer, event, or want to promote their business.

We are happy to place your text or banner advertisement, PR articles, contests, surveys, and creative campaigns tailored to your needs. We also provide localization of the offer into Russian and adaptation to the target market.
We are looking forward to working together!
